definition.text: The Manage Stage enables the management of your stop loss and take profit targets in phases. Let's see how that looks in simulations...

paragraphs.text: Find the Stop Loss and the Take Profit layers and turn them on!
It's probably self-explanatory, right? The Phase icon marks the switching of phases, thus, of the Formula used to determine each target.
This is a fantastic feature when designing strategies, as you can literally see what the formula does, and how phases change!
